label: 天王寺別当次第
本: Five Mountains: The Rinzai Zen Monastic Institution in Medieval Japan . Harvard University Press . 1981
見出し読み: てんのうじ べっとう しだい
見出し読み_mod: てんのうじ べっとう しだい
説明文: An appointment record for the abbotship of Shitennoji covering the years 837-1463. The document is very spartan, noting only the names of the abbots and their years of appointment.
